betterstats.hud.hint.add_widget: Right click a statistic ([Shift]+RMB) to add it here.
betterstats.hud.hint.del_widget: Press Backspace (<-) to remove a hovered entry.
betterstats.hud.hint.esc_close: Press Escape (ESC) to close this screen.
betterstats.hud.accuracy_mode_warning.me:
IMPORTANT:
By enabling this feature, the server will detect that you have 'betterstats' installed. To protect your privacy, do not use this feature on servers that may not allow this mod.

Enabling this feature makes the Heads-Up Display (HUD) stats more accurate and real-time by allowing 'betterstats' to communicate with the server. Note that 'betterstats' must also be installed on the server for this feature to work.
betterstats.hud.accuracy_mode_warning.to: Enables more accurate and real-time stats in the HUD.
betterstats.gui.no_stats_yet: There are no stats to show yet...
betterstats.gui.network.btn_radio.warnin:
IMPORTANT:
By enabling this feature, the server will find out that you are using a modified client with 'betterstats' installed. To protect your privacy, do not use this feature on servers that may not allow modified clients or this mod.

Enabling this feature adds some extra features that are available when the mod is installed on the server as well.
betterstats.gui.network.badges.ee_icon_n: Note: The current badge icon is an 'Easter Egg', and has nothing to do with the badge description.
betterstats.gui.network.badges.badgeless:
You've unlocked the secret badge of having no badges!
This badge indicates the player has no badges assigned to them.
Visit the 'Better Stats' wiki for more info.
betterstats.gui.network.badges.dedicatio: You've shown true dedication! You have played on this world for at least 12 days (288 hours).
betterstats.gui.network.badges.loyalty.d: Your loyalty is commendable! You have played on this world for at least 24 days (576 hours).
betterstats.gui.network.badges.the_next_: You've held the symbol of ultimate triumph - the Dragon Egg.
betterstats.gui.network.badges.bss_suppo: You've shown support for the 'Better Stats' mod, and/or its development.
betterstats.gui.network.badges.bss_debug: You reported a bug or some other issue related to the 'Better Stats' mod.
betterstats.gui.network.badges.bss_trans: You helped translate the 'Better Stats' mod to other languages.
